---
title: Multi-Region Support
description: Run browser sessions across multiple geographic regions
---

Multi-Region Support allows you to run browser sessions in data centers across different geographic locations worldwide. This enables lower latency for regional targets, compliance with data residency requirements, and testing geo-specific functionality.

## Key Benefits

- **Global coverage** - Run sessions in regions closest to your targets
- **Lower latency** - Reduce round-trip time for regional websites
- **Data residency** - Keep data processing within specific regions
- **Geo-testing** - Verify regional content and functionality

<Info>
  **Enterprise Feature**

  Multi-Region Support is available exclusively for enterprise customers. Contact [andrea@notte.cc](mailto:andrea@notte.cc) to learn more about enterprise plans and regional deployment options.
</Info>
